thread.section_title: McDonald’s Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McDonald’s | www.macdonalds.com
thread.title: Jane poller

author: Jane poller
title: Jane poller
text: I visited there for some quick fast food late summer 2016. I had to walk out in disgust as there were flies all over the kitchen area, lots of them not just one or two. No staff seemed to bat an eyelid at them as they proceeded to land randomly on the walls, ceiling and the customer service counter. I walked out and purchased something from elsewhere. Disgusting.
